plot: Before he can marry his sweetheart, a city boy from the USA is challenged to prove his work ethic on a farm in Bangladesh.
title: Nissash Amar Tumi
plot_es: Before he can marry his sweetheart, a city boy from the USA is challenged to prove his work ethic on a farm in Bangladesh.
plot_en: Before he can marry his sweetheart, a city boy from the USA is challenged to prove his work ethic on a farm in Bangladesh.
